Hi Colin, 

From your last post I'm not sure whether you still
want a stand alone exe or the screensaver...

The status of this is that I get it working at home on
Monday, brought it wo work on Tuesday and it wouldn't
play.  So I check that out on Tuesday evening and
brought it to work again on Wednesday and it seems
fine.  I thought I'd check it out for give it a day or
two before sending it to anyone else, however...

The system-tray version will take a day or two more
because the SS was my first priority...

Ian
